00023 #define IFSMODE std::ios::in
00024 #define SPEED_FASTEST "Fastest"
00025 #define SPEED_FAST "Fast"
00026 #define SPEED_NORMAL "Normal"
00027 #define SPEED_SLOW "Slow"
00028 
00029 #define RECORDREADER_DELAY 20
00030 #define RECORD_READER_NUM_THREADS 2

00032 XRawStreamRecordReader::XIOError::XIOError(const char *file, int line)
00033     : XRecordError(i18n("IO Error"), file, line) {}
00034 XRawStreamRecordReader::XIOError::XIOError(const XString &msg, const char *file, int line)
00035     : XRecordError(msg, file, line) {}
00036 XRawStreamRecordReader::XBufferOverflowError::XBufferOverflowError(const char *file, int line)
00037     : XIOError(i18n("Buffer Overflow Error"), file, line) {}
00038 XRawStreamRecordReader::XBrokenRecordError::XBrokenRecordError(const char *file, int line)
00039     : XRecordError(i18n("Broken Record Error"), file, line) {}
00040 XRawStreamRecordReader::XNoDriverError::
00041 XNoDriverError(const XString &driver_name, const char *file, int line)
00042     : XRecordError(i18n("No Driver Error: ") + driver_name, file, line),
00043       name(driver_name) {}

00045 XRawStreamRecordReader::XRawStreamRecordReader(const char *name, bool runtime, const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &driverlist)
00046     : XRawStream(name, runtime, driverlist),
00047       m_speed(create<XComboNode>("Speed", true, true)),
00048       m_fastForward(create<XBoolNode>("FastForward", true)),
00049       m_rewind(create<XBoolNode>("Rewind", true)),
00050       m_stop(create<XNode>("Stop", true)),
00051       m_first(create<XNode>("First", true)),
00052       m_next(create<XNode>("Next", true)),
00053       m_back(create<XNode>("Back", true)),
00054       m_posString(create<XStringNode>("PosString", true)),
00055       m_periodicTerm(0)
00056 {
00057     m_lsnOnOpen = filename()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00058         shared_from_this(), &XRawStreamRecordReader::onOpen);
00059     m_speed->add(SPEED_FASTEST);
00060     m_speed->add(SPEED_FAST);
00061     m_speed->add(SPEED_NORMAL);
00062     m_speed->add(SPEED_SLOW);
00063     m_speed->value(SPEED_FAST);
00064     
00065     m_lsnFirst = m_first->onTouch().connectWeak(
00066         shared_from_this(), &XRawStreamRecordReader::onFirst,
00067         XListener::FLAG_MAIN_THREAD_CALL | XListener::FLAG_AVOID_DUP | XListener::FLAG_DELAY_ADAPTIVE);
00068     m_lsnBack = m_back->onTouch().connectWeak(
00069         shared_from_this(), &XRawStreamRecordReader::onBack,
00070         XListener::FLAG_MAIN_THREAD_CALL | XListener::FLAG_AVOID_DUP | XListener::FLAG_DELAY_ADAPTIVE);
00071     m_lsnNext = m_next->onTouch().connectWeak(
00072         shared_from_this(), &XRawStreamRecordReader::onNext,
00073         XListener::FLAG_MAIN_THREAD_CALL | XListener::FLAG_AVOID_DUP | XListener::FLAG_DELAY_ADAPTIVE);
00074     m_lsnStop = m_stop->onTouch().connectWeak(
00075         shared_from_this(), &XRawStreamRecordReader::onStop,
00076         XListener::FLAG_MAIN_THREAD_CALL | XListener::FLAG_AVOID_DUP | XListener::FLAG_DELAY_ADAPTIVE);
00077     m_lsnPlayCond = m_fastForward->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00078         shared_from_this(), 
00079         &XRawStreamRecordReader::onPlayCondChanged,
00080         XListener::FLAG_MAIN_THREAD_CALL | XListener::FLAG_AVOID_DUP | XListener::FLAG_DELAY_ADAPTIVE);
00081     m_rewind->onValueChanged().connect(m_lsnPlayCond);
00082     m_speed->onValueChanged().connect(m_lsnPlayCond);
00083     
00084     m_threads.resize(RECORD_READER_NUM_THREADS);
00085     for(tThreadIt it = m_threads.begin(); it != m_threads.end(); it++) {
00086         it->reset(new XThread<XRawStreamRecordReader>(shared_from_this(),
00087                                                       &XRawStreamRecordReader::execute));
00088         (*it)->resume();
00089     }
00090 }
00091 void
00092 XRawStreamRecordReader::onOpen(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &)
00093 {
00094     if(m_pGFD) gzclose(m_pGFD);
00095     m_pGFD = gzopen(QString(filename()->to_str()).toLocal8Bit().data(), "rb");
00096 }
00097 void
00098 XRawStreamRecordReader::readHeader(void *fd)
00099     throw (XRawStreamRecordReader::XRecordError &)
00100 {
00101     if(gzeof(fd))
00102         throw XIOError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00103     uint32_t size =
00104         sizeof(uint32_t) //allsize
00105         + sizeof(int32_t) //time().sec()
00106         + sizeof(int32_t); //time().usec()
00107     std::vector<char> buf(size);
00108     std::vector<char>::iterator it = buf.begin();
00109     if(gzread(fd, &buf[0], size) == -1) throw XIOError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00110     m_allsize = XPrimaryDriver::pop<uint32_t>(it);
00111     long sec = XPrimaryDriver::pop<int32_t>(it);
00112     long usec = XPrimaryDriver::pop<int32_t>(it);
00113     m_time = XTime(sec, usec);
00114 }
00115 void
00116 XRawStreamRecordReader::parseOne(void *fd, XMutex &mutex)
00117     throw (XRawStreamRecordReader::XRecordError &)
00118 {
00119     readHeader(fd);
00120     char name[256], sup[256];
00121     gzgetline(fd, (unsigned char*)name, 256, '\0');
00122     gzgetline(fd, (unsigned char*)sup, 256, '\0');
00123     if(strlen(name) == 0) {
00124         throw XBrokenRecordError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00125     }
00126     shared_ptr<XNode> driver_precast = m_drivers->getChild(name);
00127     shared_ptr<XPrimaryDriver> driver = dynamic_pointer_cast<XPrimaryDriver>(driver_precast);
00128     uint32_t size = 
00129         m_allsize - (
00130             sizeof(uint32_t) //allsize
00131             + sizeof(int32_t) //time().sec()
00132             + sizeof(int32_t) //time().usec()
00133             + strlen(name) //name of driver
00134             + strlen(sup) //reserved
00135             + 2 //two null chars
00136             + sizeof(uint32_t)  //allsize
00137             );
00138     // m_time must be copied before unlocking
00139     XTime time(m_time);
00140     m_posString->value(time.getTimeStr());
00141     if(!driver || (size > MAX_RAW_RECORD_SIZE)) {
00142         if(gzseek(fd, size + sizeof(uint32_t), SEEK_CUR) == -1)
00143             throw XIOError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00144         if(driver)
00145             throw XBrokenRecordError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00146         if(driver_precast)
00147             throw XNoDriverError(formatString_tr(I18N_NOOP("Typemismatch: %s"), name),
00148              __FILE__, __LINE__);
00149         else
00150             throw XNoDriverError(name, __FILE__, __LINE__);
00151     }
00152     try {
00153         driver->clearRaw();
00154         driver->rawData().resize(size);
00155         if(gzread(fd, &driver->rawData()[0], size) == -1)
00156             throw XIOError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00157         std::vector<char> buf(sizeof(uint32_t));
00158         if(gzread(fd, &buf[0], sizeof(uint32_t)) == -1)
00159             throw XIOError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00160         std::vector<char>::iterator it = buf.begin();
00161         uint32_t footer_allsize = XPrimaryDriver::pop<uint32_t>(it);
00162         if(footer_allsize != m_allsize)
00163             throw XBrokenRecordError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00164     }
00165     catch (XRecordError &e) {
00166         driver->finishWritingRaw(XTime(), XTime());
00167         throw e;
00168     }
00169     mutex.unlock();
00170     { XScopedLock<XMutex> lock(m_drivermutex);
00171     driver->finishWritingRaw(XTime::now(), time);
00172     }
00173 }
00174 void
00175 XRawStreamRecordReader::gzgetline(void*fd, unsigned char*buf, unsigned int len, int del)
00176     throw (XIOError &)
00177 {
00178     int c;
00179     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < len; i++) {
00180         c = gzgetc(fd);
00181         if(c == -1) throw XIOError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00182         *(buf++) = (unsigned char)c;
00183         if(c == del) return;
00184     }
00185     throw XBufferOverflowError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00186 }
00187 void
00188 XRawStreamRecordReader::_first(void *fd)
00189     throw (XRawStreamRecordReader::XIOError &)
00190 {
00191     gzrewind(fd);
00192 }
00193 void
00194 XRawStreamRecordReader::_previous(void *fd)
00195     throw (XRawStreamRecordReader::XRecordError &)
00196 {
00197     if(gzseek(fd, -sizeof(uint32_t), SEEK_CUR) == -1) throw XIOError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00198     goToHeader(fd);
00199 }
00200 void
00201 XRawStreamRecordReader::_next(void *fd)
00202     throw (XRawStreamRecordReader::XRecordError &)
00203 {
00204     readHeader(fd);
00205     uint32_t headersize = sizeof(uint32_t) //allsize
00206         + sizeof(int32_t) //time().sec()
00207         + sizeof(int32_t); //time().usec()
00208     if(gzseek(fd, m_allsize - headersize, SEEK_CUR) == -1) throw XIOError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00209 }
00210 void
00211 XRawStreamRecordReader::goToHeader(void *fd)
00212     throw (XRawStreamRecordReader::XRecordError &)
00213 {
00214     if(gzeof(fd)) throw XIOError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00215     std::vector<char> buf(sizeof(uint32_t));
00216     std::vector<char>::iterator it = buf.begin();
00217     if(gzread(fd, &buf[0], sizeof(uint32_t)) == Z_NULL) throw XIOError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00218     int allsize = XPrimaryDriver::pop<uint32_t>(it);
00219     if(gzseek(fd, -allsize, SEEK_CUR) == -1) throw XIOError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00220 }
00221 void
00222 XRawStreamRecordReader::terminate()
00223 {
00224     m_periodicTerm = 0;
00225     for(tThreadIt it = m_threads.begin(); it != m_threads.end(); it++) {
00226         (*it)->terminate();
00227     }
00228     XScopedLock<XCondition> lock(m_condition);
00229     m_condition.broadcast();
00230 }
00231 
00232 void
00233 XRawStreamRecordReader::onPlayCondChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &)
00234 {
00235     double ms = 1.0;
00236     if(m_speed->to_str() == SPEED_FASTEST) ms = 0.1;
00237     if(m_speed->to_str() == SPEED_FAST) ms = 10.0;
00238     if(m_speed->to_str() == SPEED_NORMAL) ms = 30.0;
00239     if(m_speed->to_str() == SPEED_SLOW) ms = 100.0;
00240     if(!*m_fastForward && !*m_rewind) ms = 0;
00241     if(*m_rewind) ms = -ms;
00242     m_periodicTerm = ms;
00243     XScopedLock<XCondition> lock(m_condition);
00244     m_condition.broadcast();
00245 }
00246 void
00247 XRawStreamRecordReader::onStop(const shared_ptr<XNode> &)
00248 {
00249     m_periodicTerm = 0;
00250     g_statusPrinter->printMessage(i18n("Stopped"));
00251     m_fastForward->onValueChanged().mask();
00252     m_fastForward->value(false);
00253     m_fastForward->onValueChanged().unmask();
00254     m_rewind->onValueChanged().mask();
00255     m_rewind->value(false);
00256     m_rewind->onValueChanged().unmask();
00257 }
00258 void
00259 XRawStreamRecordReader::onFirst(const shared_ptr<XNode> &)
00260 {
00261     if(m_pGFD)
00262     {
00263         try {
00264             m_filemutex.lock();
00265             _first(m_pGFD);
00266             parseOne(m_pGFD, m_filemutex);
00267             g_statusPrinter->printMessage(i18n("First"));
00268         }
00269         catch (XRecordError &e) {
00270             m_filemutex.unlock();
00271             e.print(i18n("No Record, because "));
00272         }
00273     }
00274 }
00275 void
00276 XRawStreamRecordReader::onNext(const shared_ptr<XNode> &)
00277 {
00278     if(m_pGFD)
00279     {
00280         try {
00281             m_filemutex.lock(); 
00282             parseOne(m_pGFD, m_filemutex);
00283             g_statusPrinter->printMessage(i18n("Next"));
00284         }
00285         catch (XRecordError &e) {
00286             m_filemutex.unlock();
00287             e.print(i18n("No Record, because "));
00288         }
00289     }
00290 }
00291 void
00292 XRawStreamRecordReader::onBack(const shared_ptr<XNode> &)
00293 {
00294     if(m_pGFD)
00295     {
00296         try {
00297             m_filemutex.lock(); 
00298             _previous(m_pGFD);
00299             _previous(m_pGFD);
00300             parseOne(m_pGFD, m_filemutex);
00301             g_statusPrinter->printMessage(i18n("Previous"));
00302         }
00303         catch (XRecordError &e) {
00304             m_filemutex.unlock();
00305             e.print(i18n("No Record, because "));
00306         }
00307     }
00308 }
00309 
00310 void *XRawStreamRecordReader::execute(const atomic<bool> &terminated)
00311 {
00312     while(!terminated)
00313     {
00314         double ms = 0.0;
00315         {
00316             XScopedLock<XCondition> lock(m_condition);
00317             while((fabs((ms = m_periodicTerm)) < 1e-4) && !terminated)
00318                 m_condition.wait();
00319         }
00320     
00321         if(terminated) break;
00322       
00323         try {
00324             m_filemutex.lock(); 
00325             if(ms < 0.0) {
00326                 _previous(m_pGFD);
00327                 _previous(m_pGFD);
00328             }
00329             parseOne(m_pGFD, m_filemutex);
00330         }
00331         catch (XNoDriverError &e) {
00332             m_filemutex.unlock();
00333             e.print(i18n("No such driver :") + e.name);
00334         }
00335         catch (XRecordError &e) {
00336             m_periodicTerm = 0.0;
00337             m_fastForward->onValueChanged().mask();
00338             m_fastForward->value(false);
00339             m_fastForward->onValueChanged().unmask();
00340             m_rewind->onValueChanged().mask();
00341             m_rewind->value(false);
00342             m_rewind->onValueChanged().unmask();
00343             m_filemutex.unlock();
00344             e.print(i18n("No Record, because "));
00345         }
00346      
00347         msecsleep(lrint(fabs(ms)));
00348     }
00349     return NULL;
00350 }
